    • Uses of Adaptor in com.novartis.opensource.yada.adaptor

      Subclasses of Adaptor in com.novartis.opensource.yada.adaptor 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FileSystemAdaptor
      An adaptor for reading from and writing to safe, designated directories on the YADA server.
      class  JDBCAdaptor
      Abstract subclass defining many methods and fields for JDBC functionality including the construction of SQL statements incorporating pagination, filtering, sorting, and total row counts.
      class  MySQLAdaptor
      For connecting to MySQL databases via JDBC.
      class  OracleAdaptor
      JDBCAdaptor class for execution of Oracle SQL queries.
      class  PostgreSQLAdaptor
      For connecting to PostgreSQL databases via JDBC.
      class  RESTAdaptor
      For connecting to REST endpoints with YADA.
      class  SOAPAdaptor
      For execution of SOAP requests
      class  SQLiteAdaptor
      For connecting to MySQL databases via JDBC.
      class  SQLServerAdaptor
      Early implementation on JDBCAdaptor extension for MSSQLServer.
      class  VerticaAdaptor
      For connecting to Vertica databases via JDBC.

    • Uses of Adaptor in com.novartis.opensource.yada.util

      Methods in com.novartis.opensource.yada.util that return Adaptor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Adaptor QueryUtils.getAdaptor(Class<Adaptor> adaptorClass)
      Returns an instance of adaptorClass using the no-arg constructor.
      Adaptor QueryUtils.getAdaptor(Class<Adaptor> adaptorClass, YADARequest yadaReq)
      Returns an instance of adaptorClass using the "YADARequest" constructor.
      Adaptor QueryUtils.getAdaptor(String source)
      Calls QueryUtils.getAdaptorClass(String) to get the class, then QueryUtils.getAdaptor(Class) to get an instance, using the no-arg constructor.
      Methods in com.novartis.opensource.yada.util that return types with arguments of type Adaptor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<Adaptor> QueryUtils.getAdaptorClass(String source) 
      Class<Adaptor> QueryUtils.getAdaptorClass(String source, String version)
      Retrieves the adaptor class from the application context given the parameter values.
      Class<Adaptor> QueryUtils.getAdaptorClass(YADAQuery query) 
      Method parameters in com.novartis.opensource.yada.util with type arguments of type Adaptor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Adaptor QueryUtils.getAdaptor(Class<Adaptor> adaptorClass)
      Returns an instance of adaptorClass using the no-arg constructor.
      Adaptor QueryUtils.getAdaptor(Class<Adaptor> adaptorClass, YADARequest yadaReq)
      Returns an instance of adaptorClass using the "YADARequest" constructor.
      boolean QueryUtils.isFileSystem(Class<Adaptor> adaptorClass)
      Returns true if the adaptor class is QueryUtils.FILESYSTEM_ADAPTOR_CLASS
      boolean QueryUtils.isJdbc(Class<Adaptor> adaptorClass) 
      boolean QueryUtils.isRest(Class<Adaptor> adaptorClass)
      Returns true if the adaptor class is QueryUtils.REST_ADAPTOR_CLASS
      boolean QueryUtils.isSoap(Class<Adaptor> adaptorClass)
      Returns true if the adaptor class is QueryUtils.SOAP_ADAPTOR_CLASS
